writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

Parameters: An Activity context to use to resolve the issue. The activity's onActivityResult method will be invoked after the user is done. If the resultCode is @B_android#app#Activity#RESULT_OK_E@, the application should try to connect again.
The request code to pass to onActivityResult.
Throws: If the resolution intent has been canceled or is no longer able to execute the request.
startResolutionForResult(android.app.Act.Description: Resolves an error by starting any intents requiring user interaction. See @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult#SIGN_IN_REQUIRED_E@, and @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult#RESOLUTION_REQUIRED_E@.
startResolutionForResult(android.app.Act.FullName: public void startResolutionForResult (Activity activity, int requestCode)

Returns: the error code, or @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult#SUCCESS_E@ if no error occurred.
getErrorCode().Description: Indicates the type of error that interrupted connection.

Parameters: A pending intent that will resolve the issue when started, or null.

Returns: The pending intent to resolve the connection failure.
getResolution().Description: A pending intent to resolve the connection failure. This intent can be started with @B_android#app#Activity#startIntentSenderForResult_E@ to present UI to solve the issue.

Returns: true if the connection was successful, false if there was an error.
isSuccess().Description: Returns true if the connection was successful.

Returns: true if there is a resolution that can be started.
hasResolution().Description: Returns true if calling @B_com#google#android#gms#common#ConnectionResult#startResolutionForResult_E@ will start any intents requiring user interaction.

ClassDesc: Contains all possible error codes for when a client fails to connect to Google Play services. These error codes are used by @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#OnConnectionFailedListener_E@.
